oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MODELING COASTAL CURRENTS AND SEDIMENT TRANSPORT
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sheng, Y. Peter
Butler, H. Lee
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: currents
sediment transport
current modeling
transport modeling
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An efficient three-dimensional model of coastal currents and sediment transport has been developed. Simulations of tide- and wind-driven currents and sediment transport in the Mississippi Sound are presented. Results of a laboratory study on settling, resuspension, and deposition of sediment are briefly described. Wave effect on sediment resuspension is also addressed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 18 (1982): Proceedings of 18th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Cape Town, South Africa, 1982.; 70
